reviewText: although i haven't got to the three episodes yet, (Very close though... i'm at the part where Gohan goes out on his first date just to protect his identity.) i'm sure it will be great watching Chi-Chi and Bulma rooting Goten and Trunks on!
This is a great part of the collection for any DBZ fan.  It is funny, spontaneous, and full of excitement.  Highly recomended for any ANIME fan!

These are the best out of the DBZ shows they show trunks and goten in battle and how easy or how hard (i'l let you guess on that one) it is to be able to fight each other.  I say if you like DBZ than buy this video!!!

This movie is excellent it has Trunks and Goten fighting each other and it has a lot of comedy and it show what the people thought happened at the cell games and it made me laugh so if you like comedy then buy this
